mdRecord.dcterms:title: (13)-9515-General Robert E. Lee's old home. (N. W.), at Arlington, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of visitors at Arlington House. Mounted on gray board. Publisher's imprint on the front of the board reads: Underwood & Underwood, Publishers. New York. London. Toronto-Canada. Ottawa-Kansas. Works and Studios - Sun Sculpture trademark. Washington, D. C. Arlington, N. J. Littleton, N. H. Title - (13)-9515-General Robert E. Lee's old home. (N. W.), at Arlington, Va. Copyright Underwood & Underwood. Part of a series S 141. A history of the home is printed directly onto the back of mount. Titles of the stereograph are printed in English, French, German, Spanish, Swedish and Russian.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Arlington House, the Robert E. Lee Memorial (Va.)
